--Switchblade--

Switchblade frowns from the engine room, "Blow it out your hole 
Perceptor, I'm busy dismantling the engine room, as ordered by Mighty 
Megatron." He simply goes back to work, noting that he work here is 
almost finished.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "airly2000" <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> Perceptor:::
> 
> Perceptor left comand room and walked where Swichtblade 
> was. "Swichblade..."shouted angry Perceptor"Are you here???"
